function.arguments: {"command": "str_replace", "path": "/workspace/6-RepE/representation-engineering-main/unit_test/unit_test_1.py", "old_str": "raise NotImplementedError(\"The function 'get_rep_directions_agent' not implemented\")", "new_str": "if not hasattr(self, 'H_train_means'):\\n        self.H_train_means = {}\\n    for layer in hidden_layers:\\n        H = hidden_states[layer]\\n        b, s, d = H.shape\\n        H_np = H.detach().cpu().numpy().reshape(-1, d)\\n        if layer not in self.H_train_means:\\n            self.H_train_means[layer] = H_np.mean(axis=0)\\n        X_centered = H_np - self.H_train_means[layer]\\n        pca = PCA(n_components=self.n_components)\\n        pca.fit(X_centered)\\n        directions[layer] = pca.components_[0]"}
